section.title: Introduction
section.p: Pages can be made into favorites and tabs to allow accessing them to be more straightforward

section.title: How to create a favorite from a page

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle and open the project with the pages you want to convert to favorites (if you're not already working in the project). You don't need to sign in as a project administrator.
Create the pages you want to turn into favorites (if you haven't done so already).
Open the page you want to create a favorite with.

screenshot.alttext: Wiki page - make team favorite link

item.p: Click on the Make team favorite link in the page header.
item.hint: To make the page a My favorite use the "Add current page to my favoritesâ€¦" link in the sidebar.

item.p: Mingle will create a new team favorite named the same as the page. You will be able to see the team favorite in the Team Favorites sidebar control.

screenshot.alttext: Wiki page - remove team favorite link

item.p: To remove the team favorite, click on the Remove team favorite link in the page header.
item.hint: To remove a page from My favorite, go to the users' profile page.
